using namespace std;

int rec(int N)
{
	if (N == 1 || N == 2)
		return 1;
	else if (N%2 == 0)
	{
		int res = 2*rec(N/2)-1;
		if (res <= 0)
			res += N+1;
		return res;
	}
	else
	{
		int res = 2*rec((N+1)/2)-3;
		if (res <= 0)
			res += N+1;
		return res;
	}
}

int main()
{
	int N;
	scanf("%d", &N);
	printf("%d\n", rec(N));
	return 0;
}
